text: 23.30: FG 23.20; 24.5-8Gu maaŋ muuŋgiap ntige mbararagim, mbe mba guma shogirim, ana rɨmɨ zav nimra kama shogi. Gu maaŋ muuŋgiap vhemkora ana sarigim, ana ndu han mbar veri. Ana ndu han mbar verim, gu mba ana sav ana nzuav nzuai gumgi, gu mbe suaŋgi. Mbe ŋgirɨp ndu nɨman mba ana sav ana nzuav nzuai buni, mbe ntan ana suaŋrim, ndu mbe ana nzuav nzuai buni kaŋgirga.”
